messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name:  I will derive this data from the following paragraph: INCIDENT REPORT: #Q-4321-ML DATE: 12/12/24  At approximately 3:30 PM on December 12, an armed conflict erupted at Parkside Plaza, located in the heart of the city. According to preliminary reports, a dispute between two rival gangs led to this violent confrontation, leaving 3 civilians injured and significant property damage.  LAW ENFORCEMENT RESPONSE:  FIRST RESPONDENTS: Patrol Officer P. Q. R. Nolan and Patrol Officer S. T. U. Peters arrived within minutes, establishing a perimeter and initiating evacuation protocols. BACKUP SUPPORT: Sergeant V. W. X. York and Lieutenant Y. Z. A. Watson led a team of officers to reinforce the perimeter and aid in evacuating the plaza. INVESTIGATION TEAM: Detectives B. C. D. Ellis and E. F. G. Mathews arrived to gather witness testimonies and oversee evidence collection. FORENSIC UNIT: Criminalist H. I. J. Reynolds and Technician K. L. M. Bauer were tasked with collecting and analyzing physical evidence from the scene. Dr. O. P. Q. Stevenson, a renowned coroner, was also on-site to assess the injuries of the victims. Officer Nolan's quick thinking ensured the safe evacuation of multiple civilians, whereas Officer Peters provided medical assistance to a wounded bystander. Sgt. York coordinated with Lt. Watson, facilitating the swift arrival of medical and backup support. Detectives Ellis and Mathews conducted thorough interviews, while the forensic unit collected critical evidence, including bullet casings and blood samples. Dr. Stevenson's preliminary assessment suggested that the victims suffered non-lethal injuries.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.
